professionalBio.title: My Professional Background
professionalBio.work1: I'm a full-stack engineer with experience managing large scale projects and teams in e-commerce, insurance and finance. I work primarily in TypeScript with React but have also worked with Scala and Python.
professionalBio.work2: I am interested in Artificial Intelligence with Machine Learning. I studied AI through my Masters course and dissertation. I am particularly interested in the application of ML models to enhance the the productivity and capabilities of humans.

professionalExperience.title: Experience
professionalExperience.2024: I successfully completed my part-time MSc in Computer Science at the University of Bath. I undertook a dissertation on implementing a Hypergraph Neural Network for early diagnosis of dementia.
professionalExperience.2022: After Depop was acquired by Etsy for $1.6b, I made the decision to focus on my technical skill and knowledge by moving into a full time Software Engineering role.
professionalExperience.2018: Headhunted for the role, I joined my second start up Depop as Software Development Manager, leading on agile and technical processes and managing senior engineers.
professionalExperience.2017: Entering the world of start ups, I led an agile transformation for Tide, a successful fintech SME banking provider.
professionalExperience.2016: I moved to DLG as the Scrum Master for their car insurance offerings, working with a distributed team across Poland, India and the UK.
professionalExperience.2015: Starting my IT career in AXA PPP, a private healthcare insurer, I worked as a Business Analyst and Scrum Master on a large project to migrate the key workflow system.

personalBio.personal1: Outside of work, I enjoy hiking, running and learning languages.

projects.title: Projects
projects.hypergraphDescriptionShort: An explainable ML model to predict dementia progression
projects.hypergraphDescriptionLong: My MSc Computer Science dissertation project. Explores using a cutting edge hypergraph neural network to classify dementia progression risk and produce explanations for the classification.
projects.realorfakeDescriptionShort: Can you spot if a product review is genuine? German language.
projects.realorfakeDescriptionLong: Can you spot if a product review is genuine? This quiz uses real product reviews and challenges you to spot which ones are real and which are fake. German language.

dissertation.title: Explainable Hypergraph Neural Networks for the Prediction of Dementia Progression
dissertation.description1: I conducted my MSc Computer Science dissertation in the field of medical informatics. Specifically, I wanted to explore if it is possible to reliably classify the risk of dementia progression using only clinical data with an emerging Machine Learning technique using hypergraphs to express relationships between risk factors.
dissertation.description2: The project was succesful and achieved a very good classifiction accuracy of 79% supported by robust capability distinguishing true/false negative and positive cases.
dissertation.description3: The dissertation achieved a distinction award.
